nodes.text: Meori Cove was a small cove on the southeastern edge of Garrow's Neck, one of the peninsulas on the continent of Alanciar's Six Claws region. Alanciar was a continent on the planet Kesh's southern hemisphere. During the Invasion of Alanciar, the Sith High Lord Edell Vrai and his local Alanciari guide Quarra Thayn managed to infiltrate Alanciar by using Meori Cove, which was shadowed by the Eskellon Mountains and was not under surveillance from the Alanciari military.
